    Product Release Notes

    Below are this quarter's product updates.

    Index of all product release notes

    Tips:
    • If you would like be sent an email whenever this page changes, please see the Setup Automatic Email on Product Updates document.

    Video Cloud

    Feature: Brightcove-host Kollective integrations

    Product Area: eCDN Integrations

    Date: 27-January-2023

    Description: Put this in a separate page because it applies both to Brightcove-hosted and self-hosted implementations

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Sitecore Connector

    Product Area: Integrations

    Date: 6-January-2023

    Description: New release for Sitecore 10.2

    Go to Documentation

    Brightcove Player

    Brightcove Interactivity

    Device SDKs

    Feature: iOS/tvOS SDK release 6.12.0

    Product Area: Native SDK for iOS

    Date: 20-January-2023

    Description: Updated for iOS SDK release 6.12.0

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Android SDK release 8.0.0

    Product Area: Native SDK for Android

    Date: 13-January-2023

    Description: In this topic, you will learn about the new functionality provided by the Brightcove Native SDK for Android version 8.0.0.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Audio-only support with Android SDK release 8.0.0

    Product Area: Native SDK for Android

    Date: 13-January-2023

    Description: Added audio-only support for Native SDK for Android v8.0.0

    Go to Documentation

    Live

    Beacon

    Feature: Brightcove Player Plugins can be used in Beacon web apps

    Product Area: Player E Web Apps

    Date: 20-January-2023

    Description: In this topic, you will learn which Brightcove Player plugins are compatible with the different player instances used in Beacon web apps.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Player E adds new features to Beacon apps on all platforms

    Product Area: VOD and Live video playback

    Date: 20-January-2023

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to choose the Player E for your Beacon apps, and features of that player.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: 3D Secure Authentication

    Product Area: Monetization

    Date: 13-January-2023

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to use Stripe 3D Secure authentication with Brightcove Beacon apps.

    Go to Documentation

    CorpTV

    Audience Insights

    Feature: Brightcove live channel metrics

    Product Area: Linear insights

    Date: 27-January-2023

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how Brightcove live channel metrics are displayed in the Engagement & Subscriber Insights.

    Status: Released

    Go to Documentation
